long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The NordPass password manager lets you keep passwords safe in one place to autosave, autofill, and access them on any device, anytime. It‚Äôs a new-generation app for password management designed with top-level security and simplicity in mind.
 
The NordPass password manager is brought to you by the cybersecurity experts behind NordVPN, a leading VPN service provider trusted by more than 14 million users worldwide. NordPass was designed using the latest encryption algorithm, XChaCha20, and has a zero-knowledge policy. Your passwords are yours only ‚Äî we know nothing.

The NordPass browser extension allows you to:
 
‚û°Ô∏è Autosave passwords
Automatically save new passwords and usernames when creating new online accounts. It‚Äôs quick and easy.
 
‚û°Ô∏è Autofill passwords
Let NordPass fill in all your passwords for you. It saves you time and frustration when trying to type long and complex passwords every time you need to log into one of your accounts.
 
‚û°Ô∏è Autofill credit cards
It takes just a few clicks for NordPass to automatically fill in your credit card details so you can enjoy a smooth online shopping experience.

‚û°Ô∏è Autofill personal information forms
Automatically fill in all personal information forms online with just a few clicks.

NordPass Free offers a range of features that give you an easy way to secure and manage passwords:

‚û°Ô∏èUnlimited password storage.

‚û°Ô∏èQuick and easy way to import and export passwords.

‚û°Ô∏èSecure storage for notes, credit card details, and personal information.

‚û°Ô∏èAccess across multiple devices.

‚û°Ô∏èCreate strong and complex passwords with the Password Generator.

‚û°Ô∏èAdd an extra layer of security to your vault with Multi-factor authentication.
 
NordPass Premium includes all the features that the free version does, plus advanced security features:

‚û°Ô∏èSecurely share items with the help of Secure Item Sharing functionality.

‚û°Ô∏è Provide Emergency Access to a trusted family member or friend in case of an emergency.
 
‚û°Ô∏è Identify weak, reused, or old passwords with Password Health.

‚û°Ô∏è Find out if your emails or passwords appeared in a data leak with the Data Breach Scanner.
 
Download NordPass and forget your password stress. Forever.

‚ÑπÔ∏è For more information, visit: https://nordpass.com
üîí For Privacy Policy, visit: https://nordpass.com/privacy-policy
